response.overview: Tidal X: 10/20 was a benefit concert organized by the music streaming platform Tidal, held on October 20, 2015, at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn, New York.  It marked the first charity concert hosted by Tidal, following the platform’s launch earlier that year. The lineup included some of the biggest names in music such as Jay-Z, Beyoncé, Nicki Minaj, Usher, Lil Wayne, Rick Ross, Meek Mill, Damian Marley, Thomas Rhett, Alessia Cara, and many others.  The purpose of the event was to raise money for a variety of charitable organizations, with proceeds distributed to community-focused and global initiatives through the New World Foundation.  The concert was also streamed live on Tidal, giving fans around the world the opportunity to experience the show while contributing through donations.
response.title: Tidal X : 10/20
